description.raw:
depends on pull request #512

This PR adds support for loading visual plugins \(or systems attached to a visual\), which is used for specifying the temperature of objects \(i.e. heat source\) for thermal camera simulation.

Also added a temperature component for passing data from the visual plugin to the rendering system.

Test by running the `thermal_camera.sdf` world and you should these msgs in the console:

```
[Msg] Thermal system: setting box_visual's temperature to 200
[Msg] Thermal system: setting sphere_visual's temperature to 600
[Msg] Thermal system: setting cylinder_visual's temperature to 400
```

‌
